Big Game.card_desc: [Disengage] For 4s after hitting an enemy with Disengage, your weapon shots deal an additional 10% of that enemy's maximum Health as damage.

Blast Shower.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Reduce the Cooldown of Blast Shot by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy it hits.

Drain Life.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Heal for {scale=100|100} over 2s for each enemy hit by Blast Shot.

Exaction.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] For 8s after using Dodge Roll, your next weapon shot's damage is increased by 30%.

Excitement.card_desc: [Disengage] Reduce the Cooldown of Dodge Roll by {scale=1|1}s after hitting an enemy with Disengage.

Fatal Sign.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=12|12}% for 5s after getting an Elimination.

Impulse.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Blast Shot has its damage increased by 150 and its Cooldown decreased by 2s.

Incitement.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] Reduce the Cooldown of Dodge Roll by {scale=0.5|0.5}s if you hit an enemy with your first weapon shot after using Dodge Roll.

Intense Training.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 1.5s after using Dodge Roll.

Kinetics.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo for each enemy hit by Blast Shot.

Lunge.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] Increase the distance traveled when using Dodge Roll by {scale=10|10}%.

Megaton.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Apply a Knockback of {scale=250|250} to enemies hit by Blast Shot.

Onslaught.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal for your first weapon shot after using Dodge Roll.

Raze.card_desc: [Disengage] Increase the Knockback applied to enemies by Disengage by {scale=8|8}%.

Sky Warden.card_desc: [Disengage] Heal for {scale=125|125} after hitting an enemy with Disengage.

Somersault.card_desc: [Armor] Reset the Cooldown of Dodge Roll after dropping to or below {scale=15|15}% Health.

Territorial.card_desc: [Disengage] Reduce the Cooldown of Disengage by {scale=1|1}s.

Anstiftung.card_desc: [Ausweichrolle] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Ausweichrolle um {scale=0.5|0.5}s, wenn dein erster Schuss nach der Rolle ein Ziel trifft.

Aufregung.card_desc: [Deaktivierung] Treffer mit Deaktivierung reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Ausweichrolle um {scale=1|1}s.

Ausfallschritt.card_desc: [Ausweichrolle] Erhöht die Reichweite von Ausweichrolle um {scale=10|10}%.

Eintreibung.card_desc: [Ausweichrolle] Der erste Waffenschuss innerhalb von 8s nach einer Ausweichrolle verursacht 30% Bonusschaden.

Himmelsw\u00e4chter.card_desc: [Deaktivierung] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Deaktivierung, wirst du {scale=125|125} LP geheilt.

Hochwild.card_desc: [Deaktivierung] Nach einem Treffer mit Deaktivierung fügen deine Waffenschüsse dem Ziel 4s lang zusätzlich 10% von dessen maximalen LP als Schaden zu.

Impuls.card_desc: [Sprengschuss] Der Schaden von Sprengschuss wird um 150 erhöht und die Abklingzeit um 2s reduziert.

Intensivtraining.card_desc: [Ausweichrolle] Nach Verwendung von Ausweichrolle erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 1,5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Kinetik.card_desc: [Sprengschuss] Für jeden mit Sprengschuss getroffenen Gegner wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Lebensablass.card_desc: [Sprengschuss] Für jeden mit Sprengschuss getroffenen Gegner wirst du über 2s {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Megatonne.card_desc: [Sprengschuss] Von Sprengschuss getroffene Gegner werden {scale=250|250} Einheiten zurückgestoßen.

Niedermacher.card_desc: [Deaktivierung] Erhöht die Rückstoßweite von Deaktivierung um {scale=8|8}%.

Offensive.card_desc: [Ausweichrolle] Der erste Schuss nach einer Ausweichrolle verursacht zusätzlich {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub.

Salto.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Ausweichrolle zurückgesetzt.

Sprengregen.card_desc: [Sprengschuss] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Sprengschuss für jeden getroffenen Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Taumeln.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Territorial.card_desc: [Deaktivierung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Deaktivierung um {scale=1|1}s.

Todeszeichen.card_desc: [Waffe] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Nachladetempo 5s lang um {scale=12|12}%.

Absorption de vie.card_desc: [Tir explosif] Vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV en 2s pour chaque ennemi touché par Tir explosif.

Assaut.card_desc: [Roulade évasive] Votre premier tir après Roulade évasive profite de {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie.

Cin\u00e9tique.card_desc: [Tir explosif] Tir explosif redonne {scale=1|1} munition(s) par ennemi atteint.

Enthousiasme.card_desc: [Dégager] Si Dégager touche une cible, le temps de recharge de Roulade évasive diminue de {scale=1|1}s.

Entra\u00eenement intense.card_desc: [Roulade évasive] Pendant 1,5s après Roulade évasive, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Exaction.card_desc: [Roulade évasive] Pendant 8s, le tir qui suit Roulade évasive inflige 30% de dégâts supplémentaires.

Expulsion.card_desc: [Dégager] La puissance du recul de Dégager augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Gardien c\u00e9leste.card_desc: [Dégager] Toucher un ennemi avec Dégager vous rend {scale=125|125} PV.

Impulsion.card_desc: [Tir explosif] Tir explosif inflige 150 dégâts de plus et se recharge 2s plus vite.

Incitation.card_desc: [Roulade évasive] Réussir votre premier tir après Roulade évasive réduit son temps de recharge de {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

M\u00e9gatonne.card_desc: [Tir explosif] Tir explosif applique {scale=250|250} de recul.

Pirouette.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de {scale=15|15}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Roulade évasive.

Pluie d'explosions.card_desc: [Tir explosif] Tir explosif se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite par ennemi touché.

Ru\u00e9e.card_desc: [Roulade évasive] La distance de Roulade évasive augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Signe funeste.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=12|12}% pendant 5s.

Tir aux pigeons.card_desc: [Dégager] Pendant 4s après avoir touché un ennemi avec Dégager, vos tirs lui retirent aussi 10% de ses PV max.

\u4e25\u9177\u8bad\u7ec3.card_desc: [翻滚闪避] 翻滚后你获得{scale=10|10}%移动速度加成，持续 1.5秒

\u5192\u9669\u7cbe\u795e.card_desc: [驱逐射击] 驱逐射击命中目标将减少翻滚闪避的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u52a8\u529b\u7bad.card_desc: [爆裂射击] 爆裂射击会降低敌方治疗效果{scale=15|15}%，持续3秒

\u5927\u578b\u7bad\u888b.card_desc: [武器] 使你的弹药数量增加{scale=2|2}

\u5929\u7a7a\u5b88\u671b\u8005.card_desc: [驱逐射击] 若使用驱逐射击命中敌人，自身回复{scale=125|125}点生命值

\u5937\u4e3a\u5e73\u5730.card_desc: [驱逐射击] 驱逐射击的击退效果提高{scale=6|6}%

\u5de8\u517d\u730e\u624b.card_desc: [驱逐射击] 驱逐射击命中一个敌人后，6秒内对其进行的后续攻击会造成目标最大生命值10%的额外伤害

\u5f13\u6b65.card_desc: [翻滚闪避] 增加翻滚闪避的距离{scale=10|10}%

\u5f3a\u88ad\u731b\u653b.card_desc: [翻滚闪避] 翻滚后的第一击将获得{scale=10|10}%的生命偷取效果

\u5feb\u901f\u7ffb\u817e.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%的控制抗性和减速抗性

\u6742\u6280\u9ad8\u624b.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于{scale=15|15}%将重置你翻腾闪避的冷却时间

\u6fc0\u52b1.card_desc: [翻滚闪避] 翻滚后的第一击如果命中，你的翻滚闪避的冷却时间将减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒。

\u706b\u7130\u7bad\u77e2.card_desc: [爆炸射击] 爆裂射击造成的伤害提高350点，冷却时间降低2秒

\u7206\u88c2\u7bad\u96e8.card_desc: [爆裂射击] 每命中一个敌人，爆裂射击的冷却时间都将减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u751f\u547d\u5438\u53d6.card_desc: [爆裂射击] 爆裂射击每命中一个目标，都可以在2秒内治疗你{scale=100|100}生命值

\u7bad\u672f\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [翻滚闪避] 翻滚闪避后的首次射击造成30%额外伤害

\u81f4\u547d\u6807\u8bb0.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人后的5秒内，你的装弹速度增加{scale=12|12}%。

\u91cd\u578b\u7bad\u77e2.card_desc: [爆裂射击] 爆裂射击将造成强度为{scale=250|250}的击退效果

\u9886\u571f\u9632\u62a4.card_desc: [驱逐射击] 驱逐射击的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

Big Game.card_desc: [Weapon] Weapon shots deal bonus damage equal to {2}% of your target's maximum Health

Blast Shower.card_desc: [Blast Shot] You now instead shoot 3 smaller blast shots in succession, each dealing {125} damage

Drain Life.card_desc: [Blast Shot] For each enemy Blast Shot hits, heal for {150} over 3s

Duelist.card_desc: [Disengage] Hitting a target with a Disengage shot Dazes them for {1.5}s

Exaction.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] First shot after exiting Dodge Roll deals +{15}% damage

Fatal Sign.card_desc: [Scout] Enemies affected by Scout take {5}% more damage

Incitement.card_desc: [Dodge Roll][-1.5s CD Per Rank] Instantly reduce Dodge Roll's Cooldown by {1.5}s if your first Weapon attack after rolling hits a target

Infected Arrow.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Blast Shot reduces healing by {15}% for 3s.

Kinetics.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Enemies hit by Blast Shot are Disarmed for {0.4}s

Lunge.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] Increase Dodge Roll distance by {20}%

Megaton.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Blast Shot now applies a {300} Knockback

Misdirection.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Enemies hit by Blast Shot are Confused for {1}s

Shut Down.card_desc: [Disengage] Your shot from Disengage Cripples the target for {1.5}s

Somersault.card_desc: [Dodge Roll] CCs applied to Cassie during Dodge Roll have a {25}% reduced effect.

Trauma.card_desc: [Blast Shot] Enemies hit by Blast Shot are Slowed by {15}% for 3s

Agitaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Alejar] Se reduce la recarga de Rueda esquiva en {scale=1|1}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Alejar.

Ataque de golpazos.card_desc: [Saeta explosiva] Se reduce la recarga de Saeta explosiva en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo que alcanza.

Cacer\u00eda mayor.card_desc: [Alejar] Durante 4s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Alejar, tus disparos de arma infligirán daño adicional igual al 10% de la salud máxima del enemigo.

Cin\u00e9tica.card_desc: [Saeta explosiva] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición por cada enemigo que alcances con Saeta explosiva.

Demolici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Alejar] Repeles a los enemigos que alcanzas con Alejar un {scale=8|8}% más.

Embestida.card_desc: [Rueda esquiva] La distancia que recorres al usar Rueda esquiva aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Entrenamiento intensivo.card_desc: [Rueda esquiva] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 1,5s tras usar Rueda esquiva.

Exacci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Rueda esquiva] Durante 8s tras usar Rueda esquiva, aumenta el daño del siguiente disparo de arma un 30%.

Guardi\u00e1n a\u00e9reo.card_desc: [Alejar] Golpear a un enemigo con Alejar te cura {scale=125|125} PS.

Impulso.card_desc: [Saeta explosiva] El daño de Saeta explosiva aumenta en 150 PS y se recarga se reduce en 2s.

Incitaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Rueda esquiva] Se reduce la recarga de Rueda esquiva en {scale=0.5|0.5}s si tu primer disparo después de rodar alcanza a un objetivo.

Matanza.card_desc: [Rueda esquiva] Consigues un {scale=10|10}% robo de vida para tu primer disparo de arma tras usar Rueda esquiva.

Megat\u00f3n.card_desc: [Saeta explosiva] Repeles a los enemigos en {scale=250|250} con Saeta explosiva.

Salto mortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reinicia la recarga de Rueda esquiva cuando tu salud baja al {scale=15|15}% o menos.

Se\u00f1al fatal.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=12|12}% durante 5s tras conseguir una eliminación.

Succi\u00f3n de vida.card_desc: [Saeta explosiva] Por cada enemigo alcanzado con Saeta explosiva, te curas {scale=100|100} PS durante 2s.

Territorial.card_desc: [Alejar] Se reduce la recarga de Alejar en {scale=1|1}s.

Voltereta.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Acrobacia.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Aljava.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=1|1} a sua munição máxima.

Chacina.card_desc: [Cambalhota] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida no primeiro disparo após usar a Cambalhota.

Chuva Explosiva.card_desc: [Megadisparo] Reduz o intervalo do Megadisparo em {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada inimigo que ele atingir.

Cin\u00e9tica.card_desc: [Megadisparo] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição a cada inimigo atingido pelo Megadisparo.

Devasta\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Repelir] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a força repulsora que Repelir aplica nos inimigos.

Empolga\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Repelir] Reduz o intervalo da Cambalhota em {scale=1|1}s após atingir um inimigo com Repelir.

Guardi\u00e3o Celeste.card_desc: [Repelir] Você se cura em {scale=125|125} de vida após atingi um inimigo com Repelir.

Guinada.card_desc: [Cambalhota] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância percorrida pela Cambalhota.

Impuls\u00e3o.card_desc: [Megadisparo] O dano do Megadisparo é aumentado em 150 e seu intervalo é reduzido em 2s.

Incentivo.card_desc: [Cambalhota] Reduz em {scale=0.5|0.5}s o intervalo da Cambalhota caso você acerte o primeiro disparo em um inimigo após dar a Cambalhota.

Jogo Alto.card_desc: [Repelir] Nos 4s após acertar um inimigo com Repelir, seus disparos de arma causarão dano adicional de 10% da vida máxima desse inimigo.

Megaton.card_desc: [Megadisparo] Causa {scale=250|250} de repulsão nos inimigos atingidos pelo Megadisparo.

Na Mosca.card_desc: [Cambalhota] O próximo disparo dado nos 8s depois de dar a Cambalhota tem o dano aumentado em 30%.

Roubo de Vida.card_desc: [Megadisparo] Cura {scale=100|100} de vida no decorrer de 2s para cada inimigo atingido pelo Megadisparo.

Salto Mortal.card_desc: [Armadura] Zera o intervalo da Cambalhota ao ficar com {scale=15|15}% ou menos de vida

Sinal Fatal.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=12|12}% a velocidade em que carrega a arma por 5s após uma eliminação.

Territorial.card_desc: [Repelir] Reduz o intervalo de Repelir em {scale=1|1}s.

Treinamento Pesado.card_desc: [Cambalhota] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade de movimento por 1,5s após dar a Cambalhota.

\u0412\u0437\u0440\u044b\u0432\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной выстрел] Перезарядка Взрывного выстрела сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с. за каждого пораженного им врага.

\u0412\u0437\u044b\u0441\u043a\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Уворот] В течение 8 с. после использования Уворота ваш следующий выстрел нанесет на 30% больше урона.

\u0412\u043e\u043b\u043d\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Вывод из боя] Попадание по врагу Выводом из боя сокращает перезарядку Уворота на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0412\u044b\u0442\u044f\u0433\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной выстрел] Каждое попадание по врагу Взрывным выстрелом исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед. в течение 2 с.

\u0417\u043d\u0430\u043c\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Устранения повышают скорость перезарядки Уворота на {scale=12|12}% на 5 с.

\u0418\u043c\u043f\u0443\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной выстрел] Урон от Взрывного выстрела повышается на 150 ед., а время перезарядки сокращается на 2 с.

\u0418\u043d\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Уворот] После использования Уворота ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 1,5 с.

\u041a\u0438\u043d\u0435\u0442\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной выстрел] Каждое попадание по врагу Взрывным выстрелом генерирует {scale=1|1} шт. боеприпасов.

\u041a\u043e\u043b\u0447\u0430\u043d.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u041a\u0440\u0443\u043f\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Вывод из боя] В течение 4 с. после попадания по врагу Выводом из боя выстрелы наносят бонусный урон в размере 10% от максимального здоровья цели.

\u041a\u0443\u0432\u044b\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже {scale=15|15}% Уворот перезаряжается.

\u041c\u0435\u0433\u0430\u0442\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Взрывной выстрел] Отбрасывает на {scale=250|250} ед. врагов, пораженных Взрывным выстрелом.

\u041d\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u043a.card_desc: [Уворот] Первый выстрел после Уворота получает {scale=10|10}% вампиризма.

\u041d\u0435\u0431\u0435\u0441\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Вывод из боя] Попадание по врагу Выводом из боя исцеляет вас на {scale=125|125} ед.

\u041f\u0430\u0434\u0435\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u043d\u043e\u0441.card_desc: [Вывод из боя] Дальность отбрасывания Вывода из боя увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u0421\u0442\u0438\u043c\u0443\u043b.card_desc: [Уворот] Попадание первым выстрелом после Уворота сокращает перезарядку Уворота на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0425\u043e\u0437\u044f\u0438\u043d \u0.card_desc: [Вывод из боя] Перезарядка Вывода из боя сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

Burzenie.card_desc: [Wycofanie] Zwiększa odrzucenie wrogów przez Wycofanie o {scale=8|8}%.

Deszcz od\u0142amk\u00f3w.card_desc: [Wybuchowy strzał] Skraca czas odnowienia Wybuchowego strzału o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie nim wroga.

Du\u017ca zwierzyna.card_desc: [Uwolnienie] Przez 4 s po trafieniu wroga Uwolnieniem twoje strzały z broni zadają dodatkowe obrażenia w wysokości 10% jego maks. zdrowia.

Ekscytacja.card_desc: [Wycofanie] Skraca czas odnowienia Przewrotu o {scale=1|1} s po trafieniu wroga Wycofaniem.

Haracz.card_desc: [Przewrót] Przez 8 s po użyciu Przewrotu twój następny strzał z broni zadaje o 30% więcej obrażeń.

Impuls.card_desc: [Wybuchowy strzał] Wybuchowy strzał zadaje o 150 więcej obrażeń, a jego czas odnowienia zostaje skrócony o 2 s.

Intensywny trening.card_desc: [Przewrót] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 1,5 s po użyciu Przewrotu.

Kinetyka.card_desc: [Wybuchowy strzał] Trafienie wroga Wybuchowym strzałem wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Megatona.card_desc: [Wybuchowy strzał] Odrzuca wrogów trafionych Wybuchowym strzałem o {scale=250|250} jedn.

Podburzanie.card_desc: [Przewrót] Pierwszy celny strzał bronią po Przewrocie skraca czas odnowienia Przewrotu o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Salto.card_desc: [Pancerz] Spadek zdrowia do poziomu {scale=15|15}% lub niżej resetuje czas odnowienia Przewrotu.

\u015amiertelny znak.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa szybkość przeładowywania o {scale=12|12}% przez 5 s po dokonaniu eliminacji.

Stra\u017cnik nieba.card_desc: [Wycofanie] Trafienie wroga Wycofaniem leczy cię o {scale=125|125} PZ.

Szturm.card_desc: [Przewrót] Pierwszy strzał bronią po Przewrocie zapewnia {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia.

Umiejscowienie.card_desc: [Uwolnienie] Skraca czas odnowienia Uwolnienia o {scale=1|1} s.

Upadek.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Wtargni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Przewrót] Zwiększa pokonywany dystans podczas używania Przewrotu o {scale=10|10}%.

Wyssanie \u017cycia.card_desc: [Wybuchowy strzał] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ przez 2 s za każdego wroga trafionego Wybuchowym strzałem.

B\u00fcy\u00fck Av.card_desc: [Uzaklaştırma] Uzaklaştırma ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonraki 4sn boyunca silah atışların düşmanın maksimum Canının %10'u kadar ek hasar verir.

Darbe.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Atış] Patlayıcı Atış'ın hasarı 150 artar ve Bekleme Süresi 2sn azalır.

Gasp.card_desc: [Sıyrılma Atlayışı] Sıyrılma Atlayışı'nı kullandıktan sonra 8sn boyunca bir sonraki silah atışının hasarı %30 artar.

G\u00f6k Bek\u00e7isi.card_desc: [Uzaklaştırma] Uzaklaştırma ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra {scale=125|125} Can iyileş.

Heyecan.card_desc: [Uzaklaştırma] Uzaklaştırma ile bir hedefi vurduktan sonra Sıyrılma Atlayışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Kinetik.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Atış] Patlayıcı Atış ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

K\u0131\u015fk\u0131rtma.card_desc: [Sıyrılma Atlayışı] Sıyrılma Atlayışı'ndan sonraki ilk silah atışın ile bir düşmanı vurursan Sıyrılma Atlayışı'nın Bekleme Süresi {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalır.

Megaton.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Atış] Patlayıcı Atış ile vurulan düşmanlara {scale=250|250} birimlik Geri İtme uygula.

\u00d6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl Ni\u015fan.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra Yeniden Doldurma Hızını 5sn boyunca %{scale=12|12} artır.

Patlama Ya\u011fmuru.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Atış] Patlayıcı Atış ile vurduğun her düşman için Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Salto.card_desc: [Zırh] %{scale=15|15} Can veya altına düşüldüğünde Sıyrılma Atlayışı'nın Bekleme Süresi sıfırlanır.

\u015eiddetli Sald\u0131r\u0131.card_desc: [Sıyrılma Atlayışı] Sıyrılma Atlayışı'ndan sonraki ilk silah atışın %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazanır.

Tahribat.card_desc: [Uzaklaştırma] Uzaklaştırma'nın düşmanları Geri İtme miktarını %{scale=8|8} artır.

Uzun Atlay\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Sıyrılma Atlayışı] Sıyrılma Atlayışı sırasında gidilen mesafeyi %{scale=10|10} artır.

Ya\u015fam Em.card_desc: [Patlayıcı Atış] Patlayıcı Atış vurulan her düşman için 2s içinde seni {scale=100|100} Can iyileştirir.

Yo\u011fun E\u011fitim.card_desc: [Sıyrılma Atlayışı] Sıyrılma Atlayışı kullandıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 1,5sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.
